body.p: A Kentucky farmer and livestock breeder. Educated at Georgetown College. Lived in Henry County, Kentucky in 1860. Moved from Scott County to Henry County in 1850. Married to Mary S. Herndon. Father of Sarah E. Herndon, Rhodes Herndon, Amanda Herndon, and George Herndon.
